text.div:
HSPC Weight Meas Method Device

The set of codes that describe the methods or devices used to measure an individual's weight.

Copyright Statement: Intermountain Healthcare

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include all codes defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/observation-hspc-weightMeasMethodDevice

name: HSPC Weight Meas Method Device
description: The set of codes that describe the methods or devices used to measure an individual's weight.
